about_the_game:
We're glad you're here soldier, we need you.

A dark time has come upon our nation. Our forces are being overrun and we have lost air superiority. We are retreating back to the capital but we must try to save as many of our forces as we can. 

That's where you come in.

As the last remaining pilot we need you to provide air cover for our retreating Army. Using our experimental Helicopters try to save as many as you can, hamper or destroy the enemy where you can but get as many of our assets home as possible so we can mount our defence.

You'll have to scavenge supplies in the field at times and some missions may seem impossible but you must succeed! Only the final battle will tell if you have done enough.

To victory!!!!!

Fallback! Is a 2.5D side scroller where you take on the role of an embattled Helicopter pilot in the style of old school games from the 80's. Rescue soldiers, collect supplies and destroy targets across a variety of landscapes and missions to build up your defences for the final showdown.
detailed_description:
We're glad you're here soldier, we need you.

A dark time has come upon our nation. Our forces are being overrun and we have lost air superiority. We are retreating back to the capital but we must try to save as many of our forces as we can. 

That's where you come in.

As the last remaining pilot we need you to provide air cover for our retreating Army. Using our experimental Helicopters try to save as many as you can, hamper or destroy the enemy where you can but get as many of our assets home as possible so we can mount our defence.

You'll have to scavenge supplies in the field at times and some missions may seem impossible but you must succeed! Only the final battle will tell if you have done enough.

To victory!!!!!

Fallback! Is a 2.5D side scroller where you take on the role of an embattled Helicopter pilot in the style of old school games from the 80's. Rescue soldiers, collect supplies and destroy targets across a variety of landscapes and missions to build up your defences for the final showdown.
name: Fallback!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: AMD FX(tm)-6300 Six-Core Processor 3.50 GHz or above
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: 2.5D sidescroller where you control a helicopter in the style of old school hits. Build up your defences by completing missions before facing the final showdown. How long will you hold out?
